attribute.name: showNav
attribute.description: Show the "plus" and "minus" navigation icons (default is true.) Value is ignored if clientSideToggle is true.

attribute.name: showLines
attribute.description: Show the connecting lines (default is true.)

attribute.name: clientSideToggle
attribute.description: Perform client-side toggling of expand/collapse state via javascript (default is true.)

attribute.name: showRootNode
attribute.description: Include the root node when rendering the tree (default is true.)

attribute.name: preserveToggle
attribute.description: Preserve changes in client-side toggle information between requests (default is true.)
